filmography.title: The Mask of Fu Manchu
filmography.role_description: The sadistic and exotic daughter of the evil Dr. Fu Manchu, representing Loy's early typecasting as a foreign vamp.
filmography.plot: Dr. Fu Manchu and his daughter try to find the grave of Genghis Khan to use his sword and mask to conquer the world.

filmography.title: Love Me Tonight
filmography.role_description: A man-hungry countess who provides comic relief and romantic interference in this innovative musical.
filmography.plot: A Parisian tailor poses as a baron to collect a bill from an aristocrat but falls in love with a princess.

filmography.title: The Animal Kingdom
filmography.role_description: A manipulative socialite who marries a publisher, trying to force him to conform to her bourgeois lifestyle.
filmography.plot: A publisher is torn between his free-spirited artist girlfriend and his socially ambitious wife.

filmography.title: The Prizefighter and the Lady
filmography.role_description: A nightclub singer and gangster's moll who falls for a boxer, played by real-life heavyweight champion Max Baer.
filmography.plot: A barroom brawler becomes a professional boxer and falls for a singer, but his ego threatens his career and marriage.

filmography.title: Manhattan Melodrama
filmography.role_description: The woman loved by two childhood friends who have grown up on opposite sides of the law.
filmography.plot: Childhood friends grow up on opposite sides of the law: one becomes a D.A., the other a gangster.

filmography.title: The Thin Man
filmography.role_description: The witty, sophisticated, and martini-loving wife of retired detective Nick Charles; the role that defined her career.
filmography.plot: Retired detective Nick Charles and his wife Nora investigate the disappearance of an inventor involving a murder mystery.

filmography.title: Broadway Bill
filmography.role_description: The spirited younger sister of a wealthy heiress who helps her brother-in-law race his beloved horse.
filmography.plot: A man leaves his wealthy wife and father-in-law's paper box business to race his horse, aided by his sister-in-law.

filmography.title: Wife vs. Secretary
filmography.role_description: The jealous wife of a publisher who suspects her husband is having an affair with his beautiful secretary (Jean Harlow).
filmography.plot: A publisher's wife begins to suspect that his relationship with his secretary goes beyond business.

filmography.title: The Great Ziegfeld
filmography.role_description: The famous actress and wife of Florenz Ziegfeld, portrayed with charm and dignity.
filmography.plot: A biography of the famous producer Florenz Ziegfeld, tracing his rise from carnival barker to Broadway king.

filmography.title: Libeled Lady
filmography.role_description: A wealthy heiress who becomes the target of a smear campaign by a newspaper editor and his hired gigolo.
filmography.plot: A newspaper editor hires a gigolo to compromise an heiress who is suing his paper for libel.

filmography.title: After the Thin Man
filmography.role_description: Nora returns to San Francisco with Nick to solve a family murder mystery involving her cousin.
filmography.plot: Nick and Nora Charles return to San Francisco and investigate a murder involving Nora's cousin on New Year's Eve.

filmography.title: Test Pilot
filmography.role_description: A Kansas farm girl who falls for a reckless test pilot, struggling with the constant fear for his life.
filmography.plot: A daredevil test pilot marries a girl he meets on a forced landing, but his job puts a strain on their relationship.

filmography.title: Too Hot to Handle
filmography.role_description: An aviator and humanitarian who clashes with a newsreel cameraman (Clark Gable) while searching for her lost brother.
filmography.plot: A newsreel cameraman and a female aviator compete for stories and romance in China and the Amazon.

filmography.title: The Rains Came
filmography.role_description: A spoiled, adulterous aristocrat in India who finds redemption through love and sacrifice during a natural disaster.
filmography.plot: A major earthquake and flood in India bring together a diverse group of people, including a dissolute Englishwoman and an Indian doctor.

filmography.title: Another Thin Man
filmography.role_description: Nora investigates a murder at a Long Island estate, now accompanied by Nick Jr.
filmography.plot: Nick and Nora Charles go to Long Island for a weekend and end up investigating the murder of their host.

filmography.title: I Love You Again
filmography.role_description: A woman ready to divorce her boring husband, only to be romanced by him when he recovers from amnesia and reverts to his con-man past.
filmography.plot: A solid citizen recovers from amnesia to discover he was once a con artist, and falls in love with his soon-to-be ex-wife.

filmography.title: Love Crazy
filmography.role_description: A wife pushed to the brink of divorce by her husband's antics, including his feigned insanity to keep her.
filmography.plot: A man pretends to be insane to stop his wife from divorcing him after a misunderstanding with an old flame.

filmography.title: Shadow of the Thin Man
filmography.role_description: Nora and Nick investigate a racetrack murder, navigating the gambling underworld.
filmography.plot: Nick and Nora Charles investigate a murder at a racetrack that is linked to a gambling syndicate.

filmography.title: The Thin Man Goes Home
filmography.role_description: Nora encourages Nick to visit his parents, where she helps solve a local murder mystery.
filmography.plot: Nick and Nora visit Nick's parents in Sycamore Springs, where Nick tries to impress his father by solving a murder.

filmography.title: The Best Years of Our Lives
filmography.role_description: The intelligent and supportive wife of a returning WWII sergeant, anchoring one of cinema's greatest dramas.
filmography.plot: Three WWII veterans return home to small-town America to discover that they and their families have changed.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Picture; BAFTA: Win – Best Film

filmography.title: The Bachelor and the Bobby-Soxer
filmography.role_description: A dignified judge who orders a playboy artist to date her teenage sister, eventually falling for him herself.
filmography.plot: A high school girl falls for a playboy artist, and the judge who is her older sister orders him to date her so that she will see the error of her ways.

filmography.title: Song of the Thin Man
filmography.role_description: Nora and Nick enter the world of jazz musicians to solve a murder on a gambling ship in their final outing.
filmography.plot: Nick and Nora investigate the murder of a bandleader on a gambling ship, leading them into the jazz world.

filmography.title: Mr. Blandings Builds His Dream House
filmography.role_description: The patient, level-headed wife who navigates the chaotic construction of a country home with her stressed husband.
filmography.plot: A man and his wife decide to move from their tiny New York apartment to the country, where they try to build a home of their own.

filmography.title: The Red Pony
filmography.role_description: The understanding mother of a young boy who learns about life and death through his pony.
filmography.plot: A boy is given a pony by his father, but when the pony escapes and dies, the boy blames the stable hand.

filmography.title: Cheaper by the Dozen
filmography.role_description: The psychologist matriarch of a family with 12 children, balancing her career with her husband's efficiency obsession.
filmography.plot: The story of the Gilbreth family, led by efficiency expert Frank and psychologist Lillian, and their twelve children.

filmography.title: Midnight Lace
filmography.role_description: The warm and supportive aunt of an American heiress who is being terrorized in London.
filmography.plot: An American woman in London is stalked and threatened by an unknown caller, but no one believes her.

filmography.title: Airport 1975
filmography.role_description: A heavy-drinking, cheerful passenger on a doomed flight, providing comic relief amidst the disaster.
filmography.plot: A 747 is struck by a small plane, leaving the flight crew dead or incapacitated, and a stewardess must fly the plane.

filmography.title: Just Tell Me What You Want
filmography.role_description: The sharp-tongued, loyal executive assistant to a tyrannical mogul; Loy's final film role.
filmography.plot: A business tycoon tries to win back his mistress and protégé after she leaves him for a younger man.
